title: The Best Male God - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Episodic   God Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hypnotism   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Ruthless Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Showbiz   World Hopping   World Travel
author: 江湖不见
description:
Zhou Zekai is a lonely ghost who tunnels from world to world to complete tasks issued by several wishers. He believed that once he completed one thousand tasks, he would be able to go back to the past and find his real self.

A deceived film empress, a child bullied in school, an unfaithful wife’s husband, an abducted college student sent into a mountain village…

Zhou Zekai met various wishers and changed many lives.

This is Zhou Zekai’s tale.

This is how the seemingly endless journey began.>
